titlestmt.subtitle: An inventory of the collection at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: â€“

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: Collection contains selected press kits from Warner Bros. and Twentieth Century Fox. Movies include The Star Chamber, Mr. Mom, All the President's Men. Format varies, includes audiocassette, videocassette, booklets.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: A press kit is a prepackaged set of promotional material. In the case of movies, press kits often include still shots from the film, a page with sketches and brief bios of main characters, a plot summary, and sample posters, contained in or printed on an illustrated custom folder or packet.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Movie Press Kit Collection contains selected press kits for programming for two movie studios, Twentieth Century Fox and Warner Bros. The Warner Bros. kit was prepared by Barla, Orloff & Associates, Los Angeles, CA.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is divided by movie studio.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: &scrc_name; has a number of television- and movie-related collections. Please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing. For other press kits, see the Television Press Kit Collection and the Cartoon Press Kit Collection.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Some press kits gift of Steven H. Scheuer.

scopecontent.p: Videotape contains production information, interview with Barry Sadler. Printed material includes a transcript of the Sadler interview, introductory letter, and a cast/credit list.

Videotape contains trailer, behind-the-scenes footage, profiles of Michael Keaton and Teri Garr, selected interview sound bites, two promo clips, and a review clip. Folder of printed material includes a transcript of the Keaton and Garr profiles and a photocopy of an article from Cosmopolitan (May 1983). Also includes two slides with shots of Keaton and Garr together.

unittitle.emph: Neil Simon's: I Ought to Be In Pictures

scopecontent.p: Videotape contains production information, questions and answers with Herb Ross, and feature on Dinah Manoff. Printed material includes a transcript of the Ross interview and a cast/credit list.

Videotape contains production notes, review clip, interview(s) with Michael Douglas, behind-the-scenes footage, and trailer. Folder of printed material includes production notes and excerpt from Douglas interview.
Videotape contains "The making of Taps," interviews with Stanley Jaffe, Timothy Hutton, Harold Becker, and Howard Jaffe, and a feature story, "Actors become cadets."

Printed material includes production information booklet, foldout poster/flyer, short essay on "The Investigative Reporter and Cinematic Images," three letters from Katherine Orloff to Professor Scheuer. Four cassette tapes contain interviews with Dustin Hoffman, Robert Redford, Jason Robards, George Jenkins, Jack Warden, Walter Coblenz, Alan J. Pakula, and Gordon Willis.
